news.title: Minister for Culture launches public consultation on the future of Basic Income for the Arts
news.summary: The public consultation takes place from August 12 to September 5

news.title: jasmine.4.t releases fan music video 'Woman (A Fan Film)' and announces Dublin show
news.summary: See the new video and full list of tour dates below.

news.title: Depeche Mode to release concert film M worldwide
news.summary: Tickets for the theatrical release go on sale September 17

news.title: President Higgins condemns "despicable attacks" against Indian community in Ireland
news.summary: "Such acts diminish all of us and obscure the immeasurable benefits the people of India have brought to the life of this country," said President Higgins of the recent attacks.

news.title: Fizzy Orange, Negro Impacto and more announced for new Final Frontier Festival in Dublin
news.summary: The lineup includes Negro Impacto, Fizzy Orange, Skinner, Sell Everything and many more

news.title: Nutriband CEO Gareth Sheridan declares presidential bid
news.summary: The 35-year-old businessman is aiming to become the youngest ever Irish president.

news.title: Madonna urges the Pope to go to Gaza: "Bring your light to the children before it's too late"
news.summary: "You are the only one of us who cannot be denied entry," said the Queen of Pop in her statement. "We need the humanitarian gates to be fully opened to save these innocent children."

news.title: Electric Picnic announce Fish Town lineup
The Sultans of Ping to play one-off Kilkenny show early next year
Colin Farrell to be honoured at Zurich Film Festival next month
news.summary: Farrell's film Ballad of a Small Player comes out in Irish cinemas on October 17, followed by a Netflix release on October 29
